roles.description: Primary archetypes determining function and utility

values.name: Tank
values.description: Absorbs heavy damage and obstructs enemy movement

values.name: Bruiser
values.description: Durable fighter capable of sustaining and dealing moderate melee damage

values.name: Big Hitter
values.description: Delivers massive burst damage, typically with slow execution or recovery

values.name: Assassin
values.description: High speed and precision unit focused on eliminating single targets rapidly

values.name: Fat Trimmer
values.description: Area of Effect (AoE) specialist focused on damaging multiple grouped enemies

values.name: Healer
values.description: Restores Health Points (HP) to allies or self

values.name: Ally
values.description: Provides statistical buffs and enhancements to teammates

values.name: Debuffer
values.description: Applies negative status effects or statistical penalties to enemies

values.name: Controller
values.description: Manipulates battlefield positioning, terrain, or enemy action economy (stuns/freezes)

values.name: Survivor
values.description: Focuses on evasion, mitigation, and stalling to remain active in battle

values.name: Sniper
values.description: Engages targets from extreme range with high accuracy and low physical defense

values.name: Looter
values.description: Steals items or currency, generates resources, or disrupts enemy economy
